title: Defense spending breakdown of the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2017/18 - 2018/19
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Defense Categorys on X-axis for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion GBP.

Defense Category Military defense had the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP among all 2 groups, and it was for 2018/19. The minimum Expenditure in billion GBP was observed in Defense Category Civil defense for 2018/19.
Among all the Defense Categorys, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 in Defense Category Military defense and lowest value 44.0 in Defense Category Civil defense.
Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense had the biggest gap of 37936.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP found for 2018/19.

Defense Category Military defense had the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP among all 2 groups, and it was for 2018/19. The minimum Expenditure in billion GBP was observed in Defense Category Civil defense for 2018/19.

Defense Category Military defense had the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP among all 2 groups, and it was for 2018/19. The minimum Expenditure in billion GBP was observed in Defense Category Civil defense for 2018/19.
Among all the Defense Categorys, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 in Defense Category Military defense and lowest value 44.0 in Defense Category Civil defense.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Defense Categorys on X-axis for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion GBP.
Out of all 2 groups, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP in Defense Category Military defense and 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP in Defense Category Civil defense.
In Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP and it saw the lowest in Defense Category Civil defense out of all 5 Defense Categorys.

The maximum Expenditure in billion GBP for 2018/19 that was found in Defense Category Military defense was 863.18 times larger than the minimum Expenditure in billion GBP observed in Defense Category Civil defense.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Expenditure in billion GBP was found in case of 2017/18.

On average, the Defense Category Military defense had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP for all 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. Whereas Civil defense had the lowest average Expenditure in billion GBP.
